name: The Land Before Time: Return to the Great Valley
name_original: The Land Before Time: Return to the Great Valley
description:
The Land Before Time: Return to the Great Valley is an adventure-platformer game developed by Sound Source Interactive. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Sound Source Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play The Land Before Time: Return to the Great Valley on PlayStation.
